sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB where 1=1 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH = '$SHDH$' and QYRQ > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_pos where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select QYRQ from JXDX_POSSHDJB where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_pos gx where 1=1 and gx.SHDH = '$SHDH$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH as HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH as SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH=JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_pos.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_POSSHDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH like '%$SHDH$%' group by JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH as HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH as SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH=JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_pos.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_POSSHDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH like '%$SHDH$%' group by JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH as HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH as SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH=JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_pos.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_POSSHDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH like '%$SHDH$%' group by JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH as HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ as CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ as QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH as SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_pos.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB left outer join dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH=JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_pos.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_POSSHDJB.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH like '%$SHDH$%' group by JXDX_POSSHDJB.HTH,JXDX_POSSHDJB.CXRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.QYRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_POS.QSRQ as QSRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,DXGX_YJGX_POS.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_POS.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos inner join JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB on 1=1 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH=dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH = '$SHDH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_POS.QSRQ as QSRQ,JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH,DXGX_YJGX_POS.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_POS.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_pos dxgx_yjgx_pos inner join JXDX_POSSHDJB JXDX_POSSHDJB on 1=1 and JXDX_POSSHDJB.SHDH=dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_pos.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_pos.SHDH = '$SHDH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_pos.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_pos where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_pos set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$' and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_pos where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_pos set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_pos gx where 1=1 and gx.SHDH = '$SHDH$' and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_pos set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$' and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_pos where 1=1 and SHDH = '$SHDH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_POS(JLDH,GGBZ,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZLBL) select $JLDH$,'$GGBZ$',gx.KHDXDH,gx.QSRQ,gx.JSRQ,gx.ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_pos gx where 1=1 and gx.SHDH = '$SHDH$' and jsrq=29991231
